name: BIL_PROV_CNCT
description: All values associated with a claim are stored in the Claim External Value record.  The BIL_PROV_CNCT table holds contact information for the billing provider on the claim.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: BIL_PROV_CNCT_QUAL
columns.description: This item holds a qualifier describing contact information (phone number, email, etc) for the billing provider.

columns.name: BIL_PROV_CNCT_INFO
columns.description: This item holds contact information (phone number, email, etc) for the billing provider.
